item.title: 6 Best Mesh Wi-Fi Systems (2025), Tested and Reviewed

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude AI became a terrible business owner in experiment that got ‘weird’
item.description: Researchers at Anthropic and AI safety company Andon Labs gave an instance of Claude Sonnet 3.7 an office vending machine to run. And hilarity ensued.
